title: Savory Cheese & Spinach Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese (or paneer if strict vegetarian)
2 tbsp butter or ghee for cooking
instructions: In a large bowl, combine flour and salt. Gradually add warm water and knead into a smooth dough. Add 1 tbsp oil and knead again. Cover and let rest for 15 minutes.
In a separate pan, heat a little oil and sauté the spinach until wilted. Add garam masala, chili powder (if using), and salt to taste. Set aside to cool.
Divide the dough into 4 equal portions. Roll each portion into a thin circle.
Place a spoonful of the spinach mixture and some shredded cheese in the center of each circle.
Fold the dough over to form a semi-circle, sealing the edges tightly.
Heat a flat griddle or pan over medium heat. Cook the parathas with butter or ghee, flipping them until golden brown and cooked through.
description: A delicious fusion breakfast combining the flaky goodness of Indian paratha with a savory American-inspired cheese and spinach filling. This recipe uses cheese to satisfy the user request, although it can be substituted with paneer for strict vegetarianism. Chicken and fish were requested but are omitted to maintain the vegetarian preference.
